name: ERASED da VINCI PAINTING, 2021
description: Digital erasers on a high resolution digital copy of the Mona Lisa found on Wikipedia. 4000 x 5966, 35.4 MB. In the style of Rauschenberg's 1953 erased de Kooning drawing, I slowly scratched and smudged away pixels on a single layer allowing the background color to show through. The digital erasers were relatively transparent, small strokes or smudges. Remaining pixels indicate some of the original forms.
